impact_text: If you're concerned that these funds may be affecting their voting record on your behalf on gun control issues, get in touch with #gender_third and make your voice heard!
voted_for: Yes! On December 4, 2015 your #member_type #member_name, voted on H.R. 3672, a bill to defund Planned Parenthood & limit the Affordable Healtcare Act.
voted_against: No! Your #member_type voted in support of Planned Parenthood and the Affordable Healthcare Act.
